mapper.sql: PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, MODEL_NO, BATCH, UNIT, PRICE, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY
mapper.select: select from t_product order by CREATE_TIME
mapper.insert:
insert into t_product
PRODUCT_ID,
PRODUCT_NAME,
MODEL_NO,
BATCH,
UNIT,
PRICE,
REMARK,
CREATE_TIME,
CREATE_BY,

mapper.update:
update t_product
PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODEL_NO = #{modelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BATCH = #{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_product set PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODEL_NO = #{modelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BATCH = #{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
